quoteText: Any claim or dispute between you and YouTube that arises in whole or in part from the Service shall be decided exclusively by a court of competent jurisdiction located in Santa Clara County, California.
title: Jurisdiction and law of California

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
tosdr.tldr: The Court of Santa Barbara in California is the only one competent for disputes arising from the terms of service of Youtube. The applicable law to these terms of service is the one of the State of California.
